original_text: Still Judah has not turned back to me. She wants me to think that she has, but she has not. Like her sister, Israel, she has not been faithful.’ That is what the Lord says. 3: Still Judah has not turned back to me. She wants me to think that she has, but she has not. Like her sister, Israel, she has not been faithful.’ That is what the Lord says.
korean_text: 이 모든 일이 있어도 그의 반역한 자매 유다가 진심으로 내게 돌아오지 아니하고 거짓으로 할 뿐이니라 여호와의 말씀이니라

sentences.original_text: Still Judah has not turned back to me.
sentences.korean_translation: 그럼에도 불구하고 유다는 내게로 돌아오지 않았다.

sentences.original_text: She wants me to think that she has,
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀는 내게 돌아왔다고 생각하게 하려고 하지만,

sentences.original_text: That is what the Lord says.
